directions.step:
1. Preheat oven to 350 F.
2. Cook asparagus in boiling, salted water for 5 to 7 minutes, or until al dente. Drain.
3. Melt butter in ovenproof pan. Add asparagus and saute for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese, add salt and pepper, and bake for 2 minutes.
4. Transfer to boiler and gratinee for 2 minutes or until golden brown. Serve. Note: Use freshest asparagus available.
LELLO
EAST 54TH STREET, MANHATTAN
